user.title: Chinese Almanac
user.description:
Welcome to the integration!
Created exclusively by [@knoop7](https://github.com/knoop7)

Unauthorized redistribution to platforms like Xiaohongshu, Bilibili, etc. is prohibited.
Commercial use or derivative modifications are strictly forbidden.
If violated, updates and future code maintenance will cease.


**Traditional Calendar Features:**
• Real-time traditional lunar-solar calendar information
• Accurate forecasts of the 24 solar terms
• Daily guidance on auspicious/inauspicious events

**Birthday Management:**
• Manage family members' birthdays
• Eight characters analysis and birthday reminders

**Event Management:**
• Investment reminders
• Work schedule reminders
• Meeting and dining reminders
• Anniversary reminders
